snippet.title: Nixy and the Seeds Of Doom (ULA Plus)  - 2019 ZX Spectrum game
snippet.description:
Nixy and the Seeds Of Doom is a new ZX Spectrum game from Andy Johns, and here's some gameplay from one of my attempts at it, although I can see it requires a lot more attempts, and that you won't complete this quickly! :)

You can download it here: https://www.bubblesoftgames.com/nixy

Subscribe! https://youtube.com/user/DVDfeverGames?sub_confirmation=1
